p.seg: Letter not found; item is a register entry only, dated 22 April 1876, of a letter dated 20 April.

p.style: font-family: Athens, 'Times New Roman'; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

p.seg: boys may be retained at the Barracks

p.style: font-family: Athens, 'Times New Roman'; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: Victoria Barracks, St Kilda Road, Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Athens, 'Times New Roman'; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: M's letter was forwarded to the Industrial School on 24 April, minuted: 'for report', and returned to M on 28 April. The file does no reveal the nature of the response.
I'm surprised I couldn't find this. It might be worth another look at PRO Was the rest of the School being moved?.
